title: I HEF QEUSTION (Buying both event emotes?)
body:
Soooo, i was just wondering... what would happen if someone were to craft both event emotes?? e - e
would they over lap each other?? or will you waste 100 tokens on buying the other emote? Just curious o:

replies.body: You'd still need to have the summoner icon equipped for the emote during the event.  You'll have to swap between one of the other!
Oh wait, the phrasing of your sentence makes it seem like to me that the emote is only exclusive to the event, so when the event is over, will the emotes be gone? sorry if the answer is obvious! >.<
Looks like Buffy already cleared things up!  Traditionally, animated emotes would only last for the duration of the event it was intended for.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=chekuhluh,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=st3q3pOt,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-06-21T07:35:24.329+0000)
>
> Oh wait, the phrasing of your sentence makes it seem like to me that the emote is only exclusive to the event, so when the event is over, will the emotes be gone? sorry if the answer is obvious! >.<

All emotes expire around the end of the event. This is true for all event emotes, at least so far.

ohhh, alright, thanks for the insight!.. .  .

**_*intensely spamming ctrl+6_***
Ahhh, okay thanks!! that makes a lot more sense xD
